data.text: @LinguardSage @tyler11_tyler @PamalaDalrympl2 @EnemyInAState @khadijakamala Bothers me they're selling 'lab' goggles that are vented. Were so wrong about SARS CoV2 being aerosolized. We should be treating all these pathogens as if they are aerosolized until proven otherwise, which is apparently really hard to do. Remember how long that debate lasted?

@LinguardSage @tyler11_tyler @PamalaDalrympl2 @EnemyInAState @khadijakamala They do sell vent free ones. You must read the reviews though. Some ppl say they aren't really vent free, but these are made for firefighters so meant to work with masks. Sellstrom Safety Goggles, Wildland Fire OTG Eye Protection https://t.co/ugW93fDqiH

@DSlayer520 @OG97921596 @EnemyInAState I think humans have a natural tendency to group into cliques, especially extraverts.  Once identifying with a group, they lose themselves and become even less aware than usual:  only belonging to the group matters; they feel part of something big.
@PatriceBoivin @DSlayer520 @EnemyInAState I don't think it does. I've seen people posting photos of N95s in grocery stores in republican states. They're available all over the US.
@DSlayer520 @EnemyInAState True but my understanding is that they actually can't because they're a minority government (theoretically they could, but not in practice)

@OG97921596 @EnemyInAState I thought they could invoke the emergency act of a health hazard and tell the provincial govs to put in more proper measures when appropriate. If not that should be allowed. I'm not one for big gov having control over things but this is an exception imo.

@PatriceBoivin @OG97921596 @EnemyInAState The conservatives can go on and on about the liberals politicizing covid but the fact is that they profited off the "my rights" thing during the early days of this pandemic. With antimask protests etc.

@PatriceBoivin @OG97921596 @EnemyInAState Yeah once again because covid has been politicized. A virus being politicized is still baffling to me. We should have been listening to the science of this virus from the beginning but nope agendas and profits are more important. Originally it was just that until the antimaskers.
@MattPrinciple @EnemyInAState I agree, but it depends on where. PEI never stopped testing. NB has been reporting rapid tests. Nova Scotia, Alberta, Ontario and BC stopped testing almost entirely.
@DSlayer520 @EnemyInAState I'm not sure there's much they can do. Is there?
